00010 string stripArrayDepth(string type, int depth) {
00011         // if the depth we are trying to remove is greater than the depth of the
00012         // type we have a problem. Not sure how to deal with this yet...
00013         if(getArrayDepth(type) > depth)
00014                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00015         
00016         // this is also a fairly pseudo method for removing elements, this
00017         // method assumes the person has matching [ and ]
00018         int end = type.length() - 1;
00019         for(int depthCount = 0; depthCount < depth && end >= 0; --end)
00020                 if(type[end] == '[') ++depthCount;
00021         
00022         return trim(type.substr(0, end + 1));
00023 }
